item.title: Hardships of self-archiving
item.description: It was not easy to supplement my publication list with PDFs. Not every version can be self-archived and shared through a personal site — one should observe publishers’ rules. Most publishers allow to share only versions prior to copy-editing and type-setting. As I am not an organised person, I rarely kept versions of papers, corrected after peer-review. That’s why I will have to thoroughly search for proper versions later.
